data.comment: The match has started.
Lazio will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Cagliari.
In the minute 4, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Throw-in Cagliari.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 5, Cagliari to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Lazio's Sergej Milinkovic-Savic gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Throw-in for Lazio in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 7, Marco Piccinini awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rome.
In Rome, Joao Pedro (Cagliari) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 8, Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Manuel Lazzari gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lazio.
Lazio drives forward and Manuel Lazzari gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Lazio's Manuel Lazzari is on target but unsuccessful.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 14, Cagliari's Artur Ionita gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Lazio have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 16, In Rome Lazio drive forward through Luis Alberto. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 18, Ciro Immobile of Lazio smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 19, Patric of Lazio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Marco Piccinini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 21, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Cagliari's area.
In the minute 22, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Throw-in for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 24, Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
Lazio are whistled for offside.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In the minute 26, Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Luis Alberto for Lazio gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Cagliari push forward at Stadio Olimpico and Giovanni Simeone gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Lazio defence.
In the minute 29, Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Artur Ionita (Cagliari) strikes at Stadio Olimpico but his header is cleared.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Francesco Acerbi for Lazio who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Attention is being given to Cagliariâ€™s Marko Rog and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 35, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Lazio's Francesco Acerbi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 36, Marko Rog returns to the field for Cagliari after picking up a slight injury.
Lazio's Sergej Milinkovic-Savic breaks free at Stadio Olimpico. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Marco Piccinini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Lazio needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Cagliari.
Giovanni Simeone (Cagliari) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 42, Throw-in Cagliari.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Marco Parolo fires in a strike for Lazio.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Lazio close to the penalty box.
The first-half has come to a close in Rome.
In the minute 45, Jony (Lazio) has received a first yellow card.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Giovanni Simeone.
Artur Ionita instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at Stadio Olimpico.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 47, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Stadio Olimpico.
Marco Piccinini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Lazio's half.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Rome.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
Free kick Cagliari.
In the minute 50, Manuel Lazzari (Lazio) gets a yellow card.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Cagliari's area.
In the minute 52, Ball safe as Cagliari is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lazio's Luis Alberto gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 54, Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In Rome, Luis Alberto of Lazio is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Cagliari needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 54, Free kick in a good position for Lazio!
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Rome.
Lazio pushes forward through Ciro Immobile, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 56, Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Rome a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 58, Simone Inzaghi is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Jordan Lukaku replacing Jony.
Adam Marusic is replacing Manuel Lazzari for the home team.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Cagliari's Joao Pedro goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Ciro Immobile is on target to give Lazio a 2-1 advantage.
In the minute 60, That's a fine assist from Luis Alberto.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Cagliari.
The home team have replaced Felipe Caicedo with Joaquin Correa. This is the third substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
Marco Piccinini waits before resuming play because Alessio Cragno for Cagliari is still down.
Valter Birsa is replacing Marko Rog for Cagliari at Stadio Olimpico.
In the minute 68, Cagliariâ€™s Alessio Cragno is on his feet again at Stadio Olimpico.
Cagliari are pushing forward but Nahitan Nandez's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rome.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
The away team replace Federico Mattiello with Daniele Ragatzu.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Lazio.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Throw-in Cagliari.
In the minute 74, Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 77, Joaquin Correa for Lazio drives towards goal at Stadio Olimpico. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Marco Piccinini signals a Lazio throw-in in Cagliari's half.
In the minute 78, Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 80, Lazio's Marco Parolo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Marco Piccinini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 83, Lazio have a dangerous throw-in.
Walter Zenga (Cagliari) is making a third substitution, with Fabio Pisacane replacing Babis Lykogiannis.
Cagliari make their fourth substitution with Luca Gagliano replacing Artur Ionita.
In the minute 85, In Rome, Ciro Immobile (Lazio) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Throw-in Lazio.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Lazio.
In the minute 87, Ragnar Klavan (Cagliari) has received a yellow card from Marco Piccinini.
Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Can Cagliari capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lazio's half?
Throw-in for Lazio at Stadio Olimpico.
At Stadio Olimpico the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Lazio get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
Cagliari to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
Lazio have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Rome. The final score is 2-1.
Marco Parolo is booked for the home team.
Bobby Adekanye is on a sub for Luis Alberto for Lazio.
Simone Inzaghi is making the team's fifth substitution at Stadio Olimpico with Danilo Cataldi replacing Ciro Immobile.
